name: Julian Raso
aboutMe: I am passionate about technology and programming. I enjoy learning new things and facing challenges. I consider myself a proactive, responsible person committed to my work. I like working in a team and sharing knowledge with others.

experience.description: Review and debugging of code in Javascript, Typescript, and Python to ensure proper functionality and alignment with quality standards.
Migration of a Chatbot to the WhatsApp messaging platform using C#.
Design, development, and integration of various scripts for consuming a web service using Javascript.
Design and development of a mobile application for the Hospital Escuela to provide both doctors and patients with relevant information for pre and post-operative care.

projects.name: Muzek
projects.description: A custom-designed landing page to present the sound and lighting events offered by the company. With an attractive and easy-to-navigate design, the page includes a featured events section, a catalog of available services, and a call-to-action button for visitors to contact for more information.
